page.title: List of films set in Los Angeles

==Los Angeles destroyed on film==
* ''[[The War of the Worlds (1953 film)|The War of the Worlds]]'' (1953) (Destroyed by an [[alien invasion]]) * ''[[Earthquake (film)|Earthquake]]'' (1974) (Destroyed by an [[earthquake]]) * ''[[The Terminator]]'' (1984) (Destroyed by [[artificial intelligence|artificially intelligent]] machines) * ''[[The Great Los Angeles Earthquake]]'' (1990) (Destroyed by an [[earthquake]]) * ''[[Terminator 2]]'' (1991) (Destroyed by a [[nuclear bomb]]) * ''[[Double Dragon (film)|Double Dragon]]'' (1994) (Destroyed by a major [[earthquake]] in [[2007]]) * ''[[Independence Day (film)|Independence Day]]'' (1996) (Destroyed by an [[alien invasion]]) * ''[[Volcano (1997 film)|Volcano]]'' (1997) (Destroyed by a large [[volcano]]) * ''[[Tycus]]'' (2000) Destroyed by a piece of the Moon after being hit by comet Tycus. * ''[[The Core]]'' (2003) (Destroyed by the [[Earth's magnetic field|Earth's electromagnetic field]]) * ''[[The Day After Tomorrow]]'' (2004) (Destroyed by [[global warming]]) * ''[[10.5: Apocalypse]]'' (2006) (Destroyed by an [[earthquake]]) * ''[[The Apocalypse (film)|The Apocalypse]]'' (2007) (Destroyed by a [[meteor shower]]) * ''[[Transformers (film)|Transformers]]'' (2007) (Destroyed by the battle between the [[Autobots]] and [[Decepticons]]) * ''[[Life After People]]'' (2008) (Disintegration) * ''[[War of the Worlds 2: The Next Wave]]'' (2008) (Destroyed by an [[alien invasion]]) * ''[[2012 (film)|2012]]'' (2009) (Destroyed by a large [[earthquake]]) * ''[[2012: Supernova]]'' (2009) (Destroyed by a [[supernova]]) * ''[[Zombieland]]'' (2009) (Destroyed by a [[zombie apocalypse]]) * ''[[Resident Evil: Afterlife]]'' (2010) (Destroyed by an [[epidemic]]) * ''[[Skyline (film)|Skyline]]'' (2010) (Destroyed by an [[alien invasion]]) * ''[[Battle: Los Angeles]]'' (2011) (Destroyed by an [[alien invasion]])
==See also== * [[Los Angeles in popular culture#Movies|Los Angeles in popular culture]] * [[List of television shows set in Los Angeles]] * [[List of movies based on location]] * ''[[Los Angeles Plays Itself]]'' (2003) is a documentary about the representation of Los Angeles on film
